entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 11:29AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...CAUTION REGARDING HIGH WATER ON THE MENDENHALL RIVER... Despite only light rain showers the rest of today, heavy rain over the past 48 hours caused Mendenhall River to rise to bankful conditions around 4 AM this morning. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:44AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Cool and Wet Into Mid Week... The cool and wet pattern will persist through mid week. Snow levels above 3000 ft could see periods of snow early this morning. A surge of colder air Monday night into Tuesday night will lower snow levels to 2000 to 2500 feet.
